channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How this startup CTO went on to lead technology and AI for Thomson Reuters
item.description: Thomson Reuters has been scooping up startups to bolster the company's portfolio of tax and legal tools. That's kept CTO Joel Hron quite busy too.

item.title: ‘Default to A.I. or Else,’ Says New Opendoor CEO in a Companywide Email. It’s a Lesson in Emotional Intelligence
item.description: New Opendoor CEO Kas Nejatian recently shared a companywide email. It’s a case study in how not to communicate with your people.

item.title: After 10 Years, McDonald’s Monopoly Game Is Back With an Unexpected Catch—and It’s Brilliant
item.description: Monopoly is back with an update for the app age.

item.title: Trump presides over third government shutdown, with fresh opportunity to fire thousands of workers and close down federal offices
item.description: “We don’t want it to shut down,” Trump said at the White House before the midnight deadline, but he was unable to strike a deal.

item.title: Wealthy Southern California town sees 4 backyards fall into the ocean—but it’s not the ‘Portuguese Bend Landslide Complex’
item.description: Four backyards in Rancho Palos Verdes were damaged Saturday evening by significant soil movement from the sinking land, according to the city.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s worried about ‘doomscrolling, addiction, isolation, and … sloptimized feeds’ as it rolls out Sora social media app
item.description: The company it would “periodically poll users on their wellbeing” and give them options to adjust their feed, with a built-in bias to recommend posts ...

item.title: People are talking to this AI startup’s cartoon panda as if it’s a therapist. The CEO is nervous because there’s no suicide prevention design
item.description: Users can set up a “panic button” but Earkick wasn't designed to be a suicide prevention app, said Karin Andrea Stephan, CEO and co-founder.

item.title: Bitcoin is up as the U.S. government shuts down. Will the crypto rally last?
item.description: The U.S. government has shut down. Last night, Congress failed to pass a new funding bill that would have kept the federal government operating normal...

item.title: Big pharma and Trump announce reduced prices on prescription drugs. Here’s who’s offering discounts

item.title: Gold prices flirt with near record high but stock futures slide as government shutdown begins
item.description: The U.S. federal government shut down one minute into October, bringing with it uncertainty about jobs and the economy. The shutdown hasn’t brought si...

item.title: How 1 LinkedIn Post Shows the Ruthless Reach of the Starbucks Layoffs

item.title: Why Spotify Co-Founder Daniel Ek Is Stepping Down as CEO
item.description: The streaming giant’s Chief Business Officer Chief Product and Technology Officer will become co-CEOs.

item.title: I Ask Candidates Their Salary Expectations, and I Don’t Feel Bad About It
item.description: Here’s why that’s a bad practice.

item.title: Economic calendar: Payrolls, construction and factory data on morning agenda
One trader says Wall Street’s big money is still scared. That's a good thing.
ADP revision shows loss of jobs in August vs. previously reported gain
Private-sector jobs fell for the third time in four months, ADP reports
